import { useState } from "react" import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { Users } from "./../utils/data"; import '../styles/Pages/post.css' export function Post(props: { postItems: { id: string, userId: string, desc: string, like: number, comments: number, date: string } }) { const [like, setLike] = useState(props.postItems.like) const [isLiked, setIsLiked] = useState(false) const likeHandler = () => { setLike(isLiked ? like - 1 : like + 1) setIsLiked(!isLiked) } return (
u.id === props.postItems.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === props.postItems?.userId)[0].username} {props.postItems?.date}
{props.postItems.desc}
{like} people like it
{props.postItems.comments} comments
); }
